name: Just a walk in the park (itch)
name_original: Just a walk in the park (itch)
description:
Just a walk in the park?

It's the weekend and you wanna go for a walk with your cute dog. But suddenly at the park your (surprisingly) overwhelming strong dog gets the zoomies. Now you have to survive as long as possible!

(personal) Project information:

  • my first game jam (feedback highly appreciated!)
  • Jam theme was: joined together
  • Solo Project (but Isabel Monreal (great Artist) supported me with artistic decisions)
  • Everything (almost) is made from scratch for this jam (except for the sound effects; you can contact me if you want the links to the free sounds)
  • I hate working on animations (so there are none)
  • sadly I didn't have enough time to finish and finetune the controller control option
  • I'm proud of the end product, but I know it can be improved a lot (especially balancing!)
